Sentencas: A reversible solid oxide fuel cell (RSOFC) is one system, which is capable of carrying out energy storage and power generation.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the electrolysis mode, an RSOFC acts as solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC), producing hydrogen (from water).
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In the fuel cell mode, an RSOFC acts as a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), generating electricity by electrochemical combination of hydrogen with air.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This study addresses the fabrication of its key component- a hydrogen electrode-supported cell that uses different oxygen electrodes (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3-delta= LSM, La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 = LSCF) within its operation under the SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The resulting performances, both in the SOFC and SOEC modes, as functions of the systems operating parameters such as humidity and temperature are also reported.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: We find that the performances of the SOFC/SOEC are improved with operating temperature.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Performances of a cell with oxygen electrode-LSM are better than those of the oxygen electrode-LSCF in the SOFC mode.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Cell performance with oxygen electrode-LSCF performs better in the SOEC mode.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Performances of cells with oxygen electrodes-LSM and LSCF decrease with humidity in the SOFC mode and increase with the SOEC mode.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Structural changes within the oxygen electrode-LSCF after the ten SOFC/SOEC operations could be an interpretation for the obvious performance drops after ten SOEC/SOFC cycling operations.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the compositional changes as well as weak connections of the cells using oxygen electrode-LSM from electrolytes after ten SOFC/SOEC cycling tests are the main reasons leading to performance drops.
Titulo: Electrochemical Performance and Long-Term Durability of a Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
